mutants.code:
def search_word(string, word):
    string = string.lower()
    word = word.lower()
    positions = []
    start = 1
    while start < len(string):
        index = string.find(word, start)
        if index == -1:
            break
        positions.append(index)
        start = index + len(word)
    return positions
